channel.title: Sectors - IATI Community Discussions
channel.description: Topics in the 'Sectors' category Include any posts here that relate to the Sectors element of the IATI Standard

item.title: Updating the CRS Purpose and Policy marker codelists
item.dc:creator: YohannaLoucheur
item.description:
The DAC recently approved the addition of several purpose codes and 2 policy markers. The IATI codelists do not include the new codes yet, which means that if our IATI files will have validation issues if we use the new codes.

@IATI-techteam, any idea when the IATI codelists may be updated?

Also, are we making progress towards an automatic alignment of the IATI codelists on the DAC’s? (I think there was something recently about this on Discuss, but couldn’t find it - it wasn’t tagged as a Sectors post unfortunately).

4 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic
item.source: Updating the CRS Purpose and Policy marker codelists

item.title: DAC WP-STAT group redefining purpose codes (sector codes) to align with SDGs
item.dc:creator: SJohns
item.description:
WP-STAT, the group that defines the codes used by donors for reporting on overseas development assistance recently discussed a proposal to redefine the DAC purpose codes (which are used in IATI as the main source of sector codes) to better align with the Sustainable Development Goals: http://www.oecd.org/officialdocuments/publicdisplaydocumentpdf/?cote=DCD/DAC/STAT(2015)9&docLanguage=En

Does anyone know if any IATI members (through also being donors who are members of DAC) have been or will be part of these discussions? It would be good to follow this process as it will have a direct and hopefully positive impact on how we report and tag our development projects against the SDGs.

14 posts - 5 participants

Read full topic
item.source: DAC WP-STAT group redefining purpose codes (sector codes) to align with SDGs

item.title: Extra reporting Org vocabularies under sector
item.dc:creator: Patricia_Dekker
item.description:
Currently in IATI there is only room for 2 reporting organisation vocabularies under sectors (98/99). For our reporting we would actually need more.
Would it be possible to extend them to 3 or 4 or more?

9 posts - 4 participants

Read full topic
item.source: Extra reporting Org vocabularies under sector

item.title: Amend 27 Codes On IATI Sector Codelist To Match DAC Purpose Codes
item.dc:creator: rory_scott
item.description:
A recent cross-check all of the codes on the IATI Sector codelist at http://iatistandard.org/201/codelists/Sector/ and the latest version of the DAC purpose codes published at http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/dacandcrscodelists.htm identified 27 mismatches.

Please see this proposal in our consultations forum for more details.

This changes will be implemented after one week, assuming that there are no objections.

6 posts - 4 participants

Read full topic
item.source: Amend 27 Codes On IATI Sector Codelist To Match DAC Purpose Codes
